official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate the Long Island Expressway, New York, as part of the Interstate System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to designate the Long Island Expressway in New York as part of the Interstate Highway System. Makes such expressway eligible for funds under the 1981 interstate cost estimate and requires its inclusion in future interstate cost estimates. Makes such expressway ineligible for withdrawal from the Interstate System. States that mileage of the expressway shall not be charged against the limitation on the length of the Interstate System.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate the Long Island Expressway, New York, as part of the Interstate System, and for other purposes.
